name: Muzzle Compensator
effects: Increases the "Compensated" quality by one, or grants it at the first level if it wasn't present.

name: Silencer
effects: Provides the weapon with the "Silenced" quality. If the weapon had the "Loud" quality, it loses it instead.

name: Flash Hider
effects: Hides the flash of the weapon's muzzle, making it difficult to detect you at long ranges.

name: Heavy-Duty Coupler
effects: Increases the base damage by 20%, but reduces magazine capacity by 30%.

name: Focus Lense
effects: Increases the Penetrating quality by 20%.

name: Heat Ventilation System
effects: Allows to use the gun for more than 10 shots in vacuum.

name: Extended Barrel
effects: The weapon gains +20% optimum and maximum range.

name: Red Dot Scope
effects: Provides Handling (+1) when shooting at optimal range, but -1 within maximum range.

name: Thermal Imaging Scope
effects: Provides Handling (+2) when shooting at living creatures, but Handling (-4) against anything else. Additionally, all injury rolls that you cause have 2 less dice.

name: Night Vision Scope
effects: Turns the difficulty increase during darkness into a mere -1 pool modifier, but adds +1 difficulty when using the scope in bright environments.

name: ACOG 4x Scope
effects: Increases all ranges by 50%, but you suffer Handling (-1) when shooting within optimal range or under.

name: Marksman Scope
effects:
Increases all ranges by 100%, but also increases the lower end of the "optimal range" by 20 squares.
If the new minimum range is equal to or higher than the upper end of the "optimal range", then the upper end simply becomes 10 squares higher than the new minimum.

name: Smart Targeting Scope
effects: Adds a -2 pool penalty to any attempts to actively dodge your attacks.

name: Fast Trigger Unit
effects: The weapon gains the Burst quality equal to 1/5th of the unmodified magazine capacity (to a minimum of 5). It also gains the Full Auto quality equal to three times the weapon's Burst quality.

name: Overcharged Plasma Cell
effects: Allows you to fire the weapon with a +30% base damage bonus at double the shot amount spent per attack.

name: Smartgun Integration
effects: So long as the user possesses a smart eye cyberware, AR glasses or an armor with Visual Enhancers, they add Handling (+2).

name: AP Chamber
effects: Increases the ammo purchase prise by 30%.

name: Waterproof Internals
effects: Makes the weapon operable under water and reduces pool penalties when the weapon is wet.

name: Extended Frame
effects: This mod does not count against the mod limit (but does count against the Mechanism slot), but instead adds +1 mod that can be installed in the gun.

name: Biometric Lock
effects: The weapon can only be used by a number of users programmed into the handle - does not require fingerprints.

name: Transformable
effects: Can switch between its original and chosen form by spending 2 AP. Repairing or modding the weapon incurs a -2 pool penalty.

name: Tactical Folding Stock
effects: Provides the "Concealed (3)" quality. If the weapon already was concealed, reduce the level of the quality by 1 instead.

name: Adjustable Combat Stock
effects: Provides Handling (+1).

name: Shock Absorption Stock
effects: Increases the "Compensated" quality by one, or grants it at the first level if it wasn't present.

name: Ergonomic Grip
effects: Provides Handling (+1) on the first attack after switching to a new target.

name: Foregrip
effects: Provides Handling (+1) when shooting from out of cover.

name: Precision Grip
effects: Provides Handling (+1) when only shooting single rounds (no Burst or Full Auto fire).

name: Shock-Absorption Grip
effects: Reduces the total AP cost of Full-Auto attacks by 1.

name: High-Cap
effects: Increases magazine capacity by 50% (round down).

name: Drum / Block
effects: Reduces handling by 1, increases reload AP cost by 1, but triples the magazine capacity (increases capacity to a minimum of 15).

name: Quick-Reload
effects: Reduces the AP cost to reload the weapon by 1 (to a minimum of 1).

name: Self-Charging Battery
effects: Reduce the magazine capacity by 20% (round up), but the firearm automatically recharges 1 shot at the beginning of each round.

name: Laser Sight
effects: Provides a free trigger on every attack after the first against the same target. Having the Laser Sight active makes your position very apparent.

name: Digital Laser Sight
effects: Provides a free trigger on every attack after the first against the same target - you require AR glasses, smart eyes  or an armor with Visual Enhancers to see your laser.

name: Flashlight
effects: Illuminates dark areas, but also blinds enemies after aiming at them for the first time (if in a dark area).

name: Underbarrel Grenade Launcher
effects: Allows to make one shot with the unmodified weapon profile of the Grenade Launcher.

name: Bayonet Mount
effects: Allows to perform melee attacks with the unmodified weapon profile of a Knife.

name: Bipod
effects: Can be braced stationary by spending 3 AP. When doing so, the weapon gains Handling (+2).

name: Dual Scope Mount (Red Dot)
effects: Provides Handling (+1) when shooting at optimal range, but -1 within maximum range. Switching scopes costs 1 AP.

name: Dual Scope Mount (Thermal Imaging)
effects: Provides Handling (+2) when shooting at living creatures, but Handling (-4) against anything else. Additionally, all injury rolls that you cause have 2 less dice. Switching scopes costs 1 AP.

name: Dual Scope Mount (Night Vision)
effects: Turns the difficulty increase during darkness into a mere -1 pool modifier, but adds +1 difficulty when using the scope in bright environments. Switching scopes costs 1 AP.

name: Dual Scope Mount (ACOG 4x)
effects: Increases all ranges by 50%, but you suffer Handling (-1) when shooting within optimal range or under. Switching scopes costs 1 AP.

name: Dual Scope Mount (Marksman)
effects: Increases all ranges by 100%, but also increases the lower end of the "optimal range" by 20 squares. If the new minimum range is equal to or higher than the upper end of the "optimal range", then the upper end simply becomes 10 squares higher than the new minimum. Switching scopes costs 1 AP.

name: Dual Scope Mount (Smart Targeting)
effects: Adds a -2 pool penalty to any attempts to actively dodge your attacks. Switching scopes costs 1 AP.

name: Bouncy
effects: When deflecting bullets (using the Omega variant of Move-By-Wire cyberware), the ricochets deal full damage instead of just half.

name: Hardened
effects: The first time during each scene the weapon would suffer the Damaged state, it ignores it instead.

name: Masterfully Crafted
effects: Adds +1 base damage, or +2 damage for a 2-handed weapon.

name: Light
effects: The first parry attempt with the weapon only costs 1 instead of 2 AP each round.

name: Throwable
effects: The weapon gains the quality "Throwable (2-5 | 10)".

name: Transformable
effects: Can switch between its original and chosen form by spending 2 AP. Repairing or modding the weapon incurs a -2 pool penalty.

name: Binding
effects: If you use the "Suppress / Distract" spending option against the target you just hit, it is twice as effective.

name: Self-Repairing
effects: After one hour, remove the "Damaged" quality from the weapon.

name: Balanced
effects: The weapon gains Handling (1). If it already has it, increase its Handling by +1 instead.

name: Protective Handle
effects: The weapon gains Defensive (1, Melee). If it already has it, this mod has no effect.

name: Magnetized Grip
effects: Drawing or picking up the weapon only costs 1 instead of 3 AP.

name: Serrated
effects: The weapon gains the Injuring (3) quality.

name: Retractable
effects: In its folded form, the weapon appears like a regular item, suitcase or similar. Unfolding the weapon into its weapon-ready form requires spending 2 AP (this is in addition to drawing it).

name: Molecular Edge
effects: The weapon gains "Pentrating (3)" (if it already has it, increase it by +2 instead). Not applicable to blunt weapons.

name: System Shock Module
effects: Upon causing an injury roll, automatically cause a cyberware malfunction roll.

name: Bludgeoning
effects: Gain the "Knocking" trigger option. It if already has it, the target has +1 difficulty to resist it.
